nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't signInGuard not be necessary on this line, since it's nested under the other protected routes component?
nodes.diffHunk:

           }} />}
       />
       <AppRoute path='/nih-callback' component={() => <HomepagePage routeData={{title: 'Homepage'}}/>} />
-    </ProtectedRoutes>
 
-    <ProtectedRoutes guards={[signInGuard, registrationGuard]}>
-      <AppRoute
+      <ProtectedRoutes guards={[signInGuard, registrationGuard]}>

nodes.bodyText: I don't understand the bug with the previous approach, could you summarize the issue? Is it only possible to have one to-level ProtectedRoutes component? Probably a comment here would be useful to prevent a recurrence of this.
